A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Poor to non-existent character development.  Terrible film.  The kids and I did have a good time locating all the plot holes and terrible decisions made by directors and script writers.  It was sad\, however\, to see old friends killed off or cast aside as if they weren't valuable anymore -- C3P0\, R2D2\, Chewy\, and Luke.  Those characters actually were well-developed once upon a time - or should I say \"A long time ago...\"
